ai-tha-ap132:1.3_0: have come to the judgments of various trees.
ai-tha-ap132:2.3_0: you’re honored in front of me.
ai-tha-ap132:3.3_0: I will make a known for the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap132:3.4_0: the poised one, the perfected one;
ai-tha-ap132:4.2_0: and Padumavatī gave me my bottom.
ai-tha-ap132:6.1_0: after pressing them in this way,
ai-tha-ap132:6.2_0: these words are admonish only to be correct,
ai-tha-ap132:7.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap132:7.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap132:10.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Padumavatī.
ai-tha-ap132:11.1_0: Padumavatī was the tenth Elder Nun Padumuttara,
ai-tha-ap132:14.1_0: The beast of flowers, such as flowers,
ai-tha-ap132:14.3_0: he perceives the seat and the fruit of the result.
ai-tha-ap132:14.4_0: I took a string of flowers like a lotus flower.
